name: Most Valued Employee
description:
GamesPlusJam 2021

Hosted by gamesplusjames · #GPJam

A Spongebob fan-game competing for Employee of the Month

My pixel art inspired by Spongebob

Funny voice-acting!

There's still more content coming. I did not add the main core mechanic I really wanted to from Overcooked.

Will make updates.

Bubbles "Designed by macrovector / Freepik"
